abstract: But the International Atomic Energy Agency also made 11 recommendations, including the drafting of a detailed plan for long-term disposal of the rare earth refinery's radioactive waste.
snippet: But the International Atomic Energy Agency also made 11 recommendations, including the drafting of a detailed plan for long-term disposal of the rare earth refinery's radioactive waste.
lead_paragraph: The International Atomic Energy Agency in Vienna said Thursday that the design and planned operations policies of a giant rare earth refinery being built in Malaysia meet international standards.

headline.main: Malaysia Plan Meets Standards, U.N. Agency Says
headline.print_headline: Rare Earth Refinery Meets Standards, Atomic Agency Says
